courses.title: Guitar Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of guitar playing, including chords and strumming patterns.

courses.title: Piano Basics
courses.description: An introductory course to piano, covering essential techniques and music theory.

courses.title: Drum Techniques for Beginners
courses.description: Explore fundamental drumming techniques and rhythms for beginners.

courses.title: Music Theory 101
courses.description: Understand the basics of music theory, including scales, chords, and harmony.

courses.title: Advanced Guitar Techniques
courses.description: Enhance your guitar skills with advanced techniques and styles.

courses.title: Vocal Training for Beginners
courses.description: Beginner's guide to vocal techniques and exercises to improve your singing voice.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation
courses.description: Learn the art of improvisation in jazz music, including scales and techniques.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Create electronic music using modern production techniques and software.

courses.title: Classical Piano Repertoire
courses.description: Dive into classical piano pieces and develop your skills through challenging repertoire.

courses.title: Music Composition Basics
courses.description: Introduction to music composition, including melody, harmony, and structure.

courses.title: Songwriting Workshop
courses.description: Workshop focused on developing your songwriting skills and techniques.

courses.title: Music Production with Ableton Live
courses.description: Learn to produce music using Ableton Live, covering key features and workflows.

courses.title: Bass Guitar Fundamentals
courses.description: Explore the basics of bass guitar playing, including technique and groove.

courses.title: Music Theory for Songwriters
courses.description: Apply music theory concepts to enhance your songwriting and composition.

courses.title: Live Sound Engineering
courses.description: Understand the fundamentals of live sound engineering, including setup and mixing.

courses.title: Introduction to Music Genres
courses.description: Explore various music genres and their characteristics.

courses.title: Orchestration and Arranging
courses.description: Learn the techniques of orchestrating and arranging music for different ensembles.

courses.title: Electronic Dance Music (EDM) Production
courses.description: Create EDM tracks using industry-standard techniques and software.

courses.title: Film Scoring and Composition
courses.description: Compose music for film, understanding the relationship between visuals and audio.

courses.title: Introduction to DJing
courses.description: Get started with DJing, including mixing techniques and equipment usage.
